list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She had an air of assurance about her.
He gave me his assurance that he would help.

list_ex_of_english: On all these topics we want information and assurances, and the country wants them too.
In early third wave transitions, such assurances proved critical to enabling regime change even to begin (ibid : 48).
They have given assurances that there will be no interference with the provisions that are intended there.
I do not see how they can be expected to do more unless they receive much more solid assurances from this side.
I have repeatedly given assurances about those matters to them.
What is needed is assurances that go to very great lengths indeed.
The members of the consultation team expressed frustration at being unable to provide convincing assurances in support of a different course of action.
We cannot ask for assurances or advice on administrative matters at all effectively.
